about.p1: Former student at 42 Paris (2 Piscines). Former event manager at SHAKE in Paris. I'm transitioning into software development and data analysis.
about.p2: I mainly code in Python and C using VSCode, as well as SQL and Bash. I'm passionate about data, AI, and cybersecurity.
about.p3: Trained via OpenClassrooms, Udemy, Coursera, edX, and YouTube (TechWorld with Nana, freeCodeCamp.org).
about.p4: I speak Russian, English, and French fluently. My goal is to solve real-world problems for individuals or companies and grow my expertise.
